basic.blooming: Flowering period May-July, fruiting period August-September

maintenance.soil: Neutral or slightly alkaline soil with loose texture or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Likes light, in spring and autumn put in sunny places, in summer place in a cool ventilated place
maintenance.watering: Likes wet environments, water thoroughly when soil is dry, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove aged tissues, dead, rotten, diseased leaves timely
